conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: walls have height and thickness with visible top/side faces, elevated angled view, and ceiling/roof removed to expose interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion with readable wall corners and interior volumes; clean cutaway. Minor simplification of some wall/edge detailing and openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches: garage at right, living adjacent, alfresco at top-right, bedroom cluster at top-left, master suite zone bottom-left, central kitchen/pantry. Some proportional/partition simplifications and not all door/window placements are verifiable/consistent at this resolution.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present in living/dining/alfresco; beds in bedrooms; kitchen counters/island and appliances; bathrooms have fixtures. A few rooms appear simplified and some fixtures/furnishings may not exactly match inferred room identities (e.g., theatre vs secondary lounge).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render on uncluttered background; good lighting; walls/floors/furniture distinguishable. Slight ambiguity in some openings/door swings due to simplified modeling.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout/proportion and partition simplifications versus the 2D plan (some internal wall runs and room boundaries are not perfectly faithful).
Doors/windows/openings are simplified; several exact placements and sizes cannot be confirmed as matching the 2D plan.
Furniture/fixture set is largely complete but some room identity cues (e.g., theatre vs lounge) appear generalized.

summary: A true cutaway 3D conversion with strong volumetric walls and a largely faithful overall layout, with some simplified partitions and opening details.
